resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108088</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108088</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204622</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Issues, we've all got them: Language arts/visual arts integration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausgaben, alle haben wir sie erhalten: 
Sprachenarts/visual kunstintegration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des issues, nous tous les avons : 
Intégration d'arts du langage arts/visual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Edições, nós todos começamo-los: 
Integração das artes da língua arts/visual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Edizioni, tutti li abbiamo ottenuti: 
Integrazione di arti di linguaggio arts/visual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζητήματα, όλοι τους έχουμε πάρει: Γλωσσικές 
τέχνες/εικαστηκή ολοκλήρωση τεχνών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las ediciones, todos los hemos conseguido: 
Integración de los artes del lenguaje arts/visual</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn how to deal positively with social issues important in their lives through personal investigation of social issues addressed in literature and art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen, wie man positiv die 
Sozialausgaben beschäftigt, die in ihren Lebensdauern durch 
persönliche Untersuchung der Sozialpunkte wichtig sind, die in der 
Literatur und in der kunst angesprochen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront comment traiter 
franchement les issues sociales importantes en quelques leurs vies par
la recherche personnelle sur les questions sociales abordées dans la 
littérature et l'art.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão como tratar positivamente
das edições sociais importantes em suas vidas com a investigação 
pessoal das edições sociais dirigidas na literatura e na arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno come occuparsi 
positivamente delle edizioni sociali importanti nelle loro vite con 
indagine personale sulle edizioni sociali indirizzate nella 
letteratura e nell'arte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν πώς να ασχοληθούν θετικά με 
τα κοινωνικά ζητήματα σημαντικά στις ζωές τους μέσω της 
προσωπικής έρευνας για τα κοινωνικά ζητήματα που αντιμετωπίζονται
στη λογοτεχνία και την τέχνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán cómo ocuparse 
positivamente de las ediciones sociales importantes en sus vidas con 
la investigación personal de las ediciones sociales tratadas en 
literatura y arte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:RUNELL CARPENTER
FN:RUNELL CARPENTER
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204622</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108088</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/issues-weve-all-got-them-language-arts-visual-arts-integration</uri>

    </item>
